test.name: Caso de teste 01: Buscar e verificar informações do produto Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70

kw.name: Dado que será necessário realizar a busca do produto "Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70"
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

arguments.arg: Americanas.com - A maior loja. Os menores preços.

kw.msg: Page title is 'Americanas.com - A maior loja. Os menores preços.'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70' into text field 'xpath://input[@id='h_search-input']'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Quando o "Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70" for localizado
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70 em Promoção nas Lojas Americanas.com'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Então ao selecionar o produto, o site deverá acessar as informações "Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70"
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: E verificar se o "Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70" é entregue/vendido pelo "${TXT_LOJA}"
Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: E verificar o valor para pagamento à vista
Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: E verificar o valor do cashback
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${ValorCashback} = R$ 1.899,00 com Ame no cartão de crédito em até 12x de R$ 158,25 s/ juros e receba R$ 379,80 (20% de volta)

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${Novo_ValorCashback} = R$ 1.899,00 com Ame no cartão de crédito em até 12x de R$ 158,25 s/ juros e receba R$ 379,80 (20% de volta)

kw.name: Remove String
kw.doc: Removes all ``removables`` from the given ``string``.

arguments.arg: R$ 1.899,00 com Ame no cartão de crédito em até 12x de R$ 158,25 s/ juros e receba

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.
